Headgears

Category page

498pages on
this wiki
Edit
  • History
Talk0

Headgear is one of three Gear types in Splatoon which can be purchased from Annie in Cooler Heads , or alternatively ordered from an Inkling in Inkopolis Plaza and picked up from Spyke.
